chunks.text: AG FA DET Ricl delle (Det (OJ Vi corre modi l'Ag disp Serv Vi salu dello sull farm sett nove genn Mini pubblici genn Vi dello pubblica Gazz GENZIA ITALIANA DEL ARMACO TERMINA 17 May 2024 lassification of the medicinal product for human use Lumykras, pursuant to Article 8 (10) of Law No 537 of 24 December 1993, ending No 33/2024). (24A02603) U No 121 of 25-5-2024)

chunks.heading: THE PRESIDENT
chunks.text: I hereby declare Article 48 of Decree-Law No 269 of 30 September 2003 before the Court of First Instance in order to promote the development and retiring of the performance of public accounts, converted into Law No 326 of 24 November 2003 establishing the Italian Genzia del Farmaco and, in particular, Paragraph 33, which places the negotiation of the price for products reimbursed by the national health insurance between the Agency and producers; I hereby decree No 245 of 20 September 2004 of the Minister of State, in agreement with the Ministers of the Public Service and the Economy and Finances, with the Regulation laying down the rules for the organisation and operation of the Italian Maco Agency, pursuant to Article 48 (13) of Decree-Law No 269 of 30 November 2003, converted, with amendments, by Law No 326 of 24 September 2003, as last amended by Decree No 3 of 8 January 2003 of the Minister of Health, in agreement with the institutions of the public service and
